column1: '''Stuart D. Lee''' is a member of the English Faculty and Merton College
column2: and Deputy [[wikipedia:Chief information officer|CIO]] at the [[University of Oxford]]. His research and teaching focus on Old English
column4: and the fiction of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://users.ox.ac.uk/~stuart/Site/About_Me.html|articlename=Dr Stuart D Lee|dated=|website=[http://www.english.ox.ac.uk/about-faculty/faculty-members/medieval/lee-dr-stuart Faculty of English]|accessed=20 July 2015}}</ref>
